items.title: Introducing the Azores: Europe’s secret adventure paradise
items.excerpt: They call it the Hawaii of the mid-Atlantic. But, really, this spellbinding region is pretty incomparable…

items.title: How a trip to the hairdressers rekindled my sense of adventure
items.excerpt: Sometimes, travel inspiration comes from the most unlikely of places. On a not-so-intrepid trip to the local salon, I hoped to gain a fresh new ‘do. But I left with so much more.

items.title: Mouthwatering Macedonia: 5 traditional dishes you’ve got to try
items.excerpt: Eating is a national pastime in Macedonia . Locals gather around kitchen tables and in cosy kafeanas (taverns) to feast on fragrant stews, pastries and salads, often washed down with a glass of wine from the Tikves Valley.

items.title: How to make the most of US federal holidays in 2026
items.excerpt: The 9-to-5 grind might not be optional, but how you plan your paid time off (PTO) is.

items.title: I spent my inheritance on a family trip to Thailand and it was the best investment
items.excerpt: When Michelle inherited some money from her grandmother, she knew she could tuck it away in an interest-earning savings account or take a gamble on some high-performing stocks. Or, or, OR she could spend it on an adventure of a lifetime.
